content: doily #25 1 crochet doily № 25 pattern by papushoipatterns materials - cotton thread 50 g / 1 76 oz / 308 yards / 282 m per skein - 2 mm hook yardage 210 yards / 192 m finished size 11 / 28 cm i hope you enjoy this pattern if you find any errors or typos please let me know pollinka911@gmail com you can find other patterns here https //www ravelry com/designers/polina- papushoi you can support my work and buy me a coffee skein of thread here h ttps //www buymeacoffee com/ papushoi copyright 2023 papushoipatterns all rights reserved doily #25 2 terminology us chain chain st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble triple crochet fp- complete stitch around the post from front to back bp- complete stitch around the post from back to front decrease 2 or more indicated stitches joined together at the top popcorn complete the number of stitches into the stitch or space indicated drop the loop from the hook place the hook in the first stitch of the popcorn set grab the dropped loop and pull it through cluster 2 or more indicated stitches worked into the same stitch or space and joined together at the top each round ends with slip_stitch in the 1st st of the round *_* = repeat around video https //youtu be/lvief5ialws pattern 0 chain 10 join to form a circle 1 chain 2 2dc-cluster in the circle counts as first 3dc-cluster chain 3 3dc- cluster in the circle chain 3 7 times join 8 3dc-clusters 8 ch3-spaces 2 slip_stitch chain 3 counts as first double_crochet now and throughout 2 double_crochet in next space chain 2 fp-single_crochet around next 3dc-cluster chain 2 *3 double_crochet in next space chain 2 fp-single_crochet around next 3dc-cluster chain 2* around join 24 double_crochet 8 fp-single_crochet 16 ch2-spaces copyright 2023 papushoipatterns all rights reserved doily #25 3 3 chain 3 double_crochet in same double_crochet fp-4dc-popcorn around next double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in each of the next 2 spaces *2 double_crochet in next double_crochet fp-4dc-popcorn around next double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in each of the next 2 spaces* around join 48 double_crochet 8 fp-4dc-popcorns 4 bp-slip_stitch around first double_crochet chain 3 counts as first bp-double_crochet now and throughout bp-double_crochet around next double_crochet chain 5 skip fp-4dc-popcorn bp-double_crochet around each of the next 2 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in next double_crochet chain 2 *bp-double_crochet around each of the next 2 double_crochet chain 5 skip fp-4dc- popcorn bp-double_crochet around each of the next 2 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in next double_crochet chain 2* around join 32 bp-double_crochet 8 ch5-spaces 16 ch2-spaces 16 single_crochet 8 ch1-spaces 5 chain 2 double_crochet in next bp-double_crochet counts as first 2dc-decrease 8 double_crochet in next space 2dc-decrease using next 2 bp-double_crochet chain 1 skip 1 space treble_crochet in next space chain 1 *2dc-decrease using next 2 bp-double_crochet 8 double_crochet in next
